subject.max_error: The subject line must be at most 120 characters.

feedback.min_error: The feedback field must be at least 60 characters.
feedback.max_error: The feedback field must be at most 1200 characters.

feedbackPrompt.paragraph: We're dedicated to improving our community and value your input. If you have any feedback or suggestions in any aspect, please don't hesitate to share them with us.
feedbackPrompt.strong: Your feedback is anonymous, and sign-in is required to prevent spam.
feedbackPrompt.note: If you would like a response from us, please leave your email in the suggestion box.
